abstract: Report on Federal Reserve meeting in March says it decided against raising interest rates and may lean toward no increase at April meeting; Fed is in patient mood as it surveys modest domestic growth and continued weakness in global economy.
lead_paragraph: Expectations are growing that the Fed’s policy-making group, the Federal Open Market Committee, will not seriously consider lifting interest rates until June.

headline.main: Fed Still Waving Caution Flag on Resuming Interest Rate Increases
headline.print_headline: Still Waving Caution Flag, Fed Is Patient on Rates

snippet: Expectations are growing that the Fed’s policy-making group, the Federal Open Market Committee, will not seriously consider lifting interest rates until June.
